title: DirectX error
body:
Go through champ select and everything, I'm finally level 20. Next 2 games I get "directx error has occured..." It shuts down the game before getting into load screen and reconnect button/relogging does not work. Just ends up going back into the error.  End up getting a warning because low amount of games with now 2 "leaves".

And yes, my drivers are up to date.  This problem has just now started after the new patch

replies.body: This sounds like a driver failing, so it can't render and causing you to crash out instead.  Run through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up.  Test it out in a custom game to be sure!  Let me know if you have any questions!
